messages.title: The Tories claim the economy is fixed, but we're worse off since 2010.
messages.content: Labour will back British businesses by cutting business rates.

messages.title: The Tories claim the economy is fixed, but we're worse off since 2010.
messages.content: Labour will deal with the cost-of-living crisis by freezing energy bills until 2017.

messages.title: Back British business, say Labour
messages.content: Labour will back British businesses by cutting business rates.

messages.title: Let's 3-plan for the recovery for the many, not the few.
messages.content: Labour will raise the minimum wage to £8 an hour by 2020.
